messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 squeaking things have descended into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone come down to sec we are doing a basic search regarding our latest findings nothing seriuse and you will get a donut!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Space station 13, your station has been detected to have an extremely lethal virus on board. All escape pods, and shuttles leading off your station have been launched or destroyed. You are now under quarentine.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

The station is passing through a debris cloud, expect minor damage to external fittings and fixtures.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Dormitory Toilets.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Attention. A centcomm commando has been sent to nuke your station.
 Thank you all for your service to Nanotrasen. You will now be retired.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Maud Haystings. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.
